import "./post.css" import { MoreVert } from "@mui/icons-material" import {Users} from "../../dummyData" export default function post({post}) { console.log(post); let postUser = Users.find((y) => y.id === post.id); return (
{postUser.username} {post.date}
{post.desc}
likeFunction(post)} className="likeIcon" src="assets/like.png" alt="" /> {post.like} people like it
{post.comment}
) } const likeFunction = (post) => { post.like += 1; }
